name: chem
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
short for
chemistry : the scientific study of the basic characteristics of substances and the ways in which they react or combine: I failed chem in high school. Does he love you for your charm, or because you let him copy your chem notes?
More examplesFewer examplesDeciding what to take with you to college can be as difficult as organic chem.The specially adapted truck is like a chem lab on wheels.They had the ruffled look of chem students who had spent all night in the lab.

short for
chemical : Two backup generators failed when the chem plant lost power. We believe they were developing bio and chem weapons. See also
chemtrail
More examplesFewer examplesThe truffle oil had a nasty chem taste.
